title: All-Inclusive Escape in the Breathtaking Kimberley Region
description: Be one of the privileged few to lay eyes upon the breathtaking Kimberley Region in WA. Stay in award-winning luxury at the one-of-a-kind Berkeley River Lodge and enjoy an all-inclusive five day/four night stay in a private villa with no seasonal surcharges, includes all meals: breakfasts, lunches, nightly five-course degustation dinners, unlimited beverages, daily excursions, return private plane transfers from Darwin and more. Only $2,399 per person (twin share), valued up to $10,450 for two adults.
location_description: Berkeley River Lodge [197091] All-Inclusive Escape in the Breathtaking Kimberley Region
